Name: Semantic Progress
Description: Progress bars show the percent of a task complete

Definitions.Active: A progress bar can show activity
Definitions.Successful: A progress bar can show success
Definitions.Warning: A progress bar can show a warning state
Definitions.Failed: A progress bar can show failure
Definitions.Disabled: A progress bar can be disabled
Definitions.Attached: A progress bar can show progress of an element
Definitions.Striped: A progress bar can be striped
